segments.text: What price do you suggest for 300,000 sets of Article No . 2323 with London as the destination port ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . It's Â£ 800 per set CIF London .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What commission terms can you offer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Usually the commission is three percent of the net invoice amount after deduction of discounts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Couldn't you raise the commission to five percent ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Considering our good relationship and our future business , we give you four percent . That's the best we can do . We can't go any further . What would you say to it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then I'll accept it with thanks .
segments.speaker: S1
